attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To Start looking after the countries old and disabled people in a more caring and considerate manner  i am calling for the minimum payment to disabled to be set at £150.00 per week linked to inflation  ,this sum can easily be provided by culling the amount paid to financial migrants that descend on this country from far and wide claiming there human rights to be paid by this country . 
It is our human right as citizens of this country  to be treated as people not something that is to be swept under the carpet of number 10

I am aware that there has recently been comment from certain ministers that the disabled are responsible for dragging the country's economy down (each are entitled to there own views) the disabled amongst us are not disabled by choice  neither are we elderly by choice  .
please vote for this petition  remember one day you too will be OLD or even DISABLED like me .

P.G.Nikolic

rejection.details: The title of a petition must contain what you want the government to do. "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Peter George Nikolic" does not make sense.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
